languages.text: At the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this effect or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: В начале каждого своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} цель должна пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}, чтобы попытаться снять этот эффект. При провале цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Toxin: at the start of every turn, the affected target must pass a Toughness resistance test to remove this effect or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.

At the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this effect or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: Zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} muss das betroffene Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} schaffen, um diesen Effekt zu entfernen, oder es erleidet {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this effect or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}: Zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} muss das betroffene Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} schaffen, um diesen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} zu entfernen, oder es erleidet {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Schaden{/g}.

languages.text: Au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, la cible affectée doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} pour se débarrasser de cet effet, faute de quoi elle subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this effect or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} : au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, la cible affectée doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} pour se débarrasser de cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g}, faute de quoi elle subit des {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g}.

languages.text: 每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，受影响的目标必须通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}才能移除此效果，否则会受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: At the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this effect or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}：每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，受影响的目标必须通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}才能移除此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，否则会受到{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}。

languages.original_text: Toxin: at the start of every turn, the affected target must pass a Toughness resistance test to remove this effect or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.

languages.text: Al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el objetivo afectado debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} para eliminar el efecto o sufrir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this effect or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxina{/g}: al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el objetivo afectado debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} para eliminar este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} o sufrir {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}daño{/g}.

languages.text: В начале каждого своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} цель должна пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}, чтобы попытаться снять этот эффект. При провале цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this effect or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: В начале каждого своего хода цель должна пройти проверку Выносливости на сопротивление, чтобы попытаться снять этот эффект. При провале цель получает урон.
В начале каждого своего хода цель должна пройти проверку Выносливости на сопротивление, чтобы попытаться снять этот эффект. При провале цель получает урон.

languages.text: 毎{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、毒が付与されたターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行い、成功すれば解除できる。失敗した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: At the start of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this effect or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}：毎{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、毒が{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}付与{/g}されたターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を行い、成功すれば解除できる。失敗した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
